page.title: 11Lord Lieutenant's Day
page.content: No time for my own affairs today! A quick glance at the morning post over breakfast,then off to visit one of the Magistrates' Courts in the south of the County with the Chairman of the Magistrates' Courts' Committee.Meet the Chairman of the Bench and local magistrates informally and discuss some of their problems before sitting in Court with them. Back to Aylesbury to a working lunch to launch an important charitable appeal;then up to the north of the County to finalise details of a Royal Visit next month. Finally back home to change into uniform to present Lord Lieutenant's Cadets with their badges and a Sergeant Major Instructor with his Certificate, after which my wife and I meet the cadets' families and their officers over a buffet supper in the Drill Hall.
